alert.note: Alert for Hardin; Logan; Union (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 4:09PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF LOGAN, EASTERN HARDIN COUNTIES IN WEST CENTRAL OHIO AND NORTHERN UNION COUNTIES IN CENTRAL OHIO THROUGH 500 PM EDT... At 409 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located near North Lewisburg, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Locations impacted include... Bellefontaine, Kenton, Richwood, West Liberty, North Lewisburg, Forest, Belle Center, West Mansfield, Northwood, Mount Victory, Rushsylvania, Huntsville, Ridgeway, Magnetic Springs, Valley Hi, Zanesfield, Patterson, Raymond, New Jerusalem and Broadway. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for central and west central Ohio. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
